LfLTmcSvwWl1.title: Logo
LfLTmcSvwWl1.fieldCaption: Optional logo graphic. Recommended height of 50px or smaller. Use 100px for high resolution screens.

C3vRB8lpG612.title: Site Title
C3vRB8lpG612.fieldCaption: An optional text title shown after the logo.

L2wd2AL3qb9V.title: Favorites Icon
L2wd2AL3qb9V.fieldCaption: Enter the full URL to your favorites (shortcut) icon file.

wWFhRmq1zA18.title: Mobile Bookmark Icon
wWFhRmq1zA18.fieldCaption: Used on mobile devices to display home screen bookmarks. Recommended image size 192x192, saved in PNG format.

PbYTaceOHC4g.title: Use Page Headers
PbYTaceOHC4g.values:
home=>Blog
single=>Single Posts
page=>Pages
search=>Search
political-issue=>Issues
political-event=>Events
political-video=>Videos
PbYTaceOHC4g.fieldCaption: Apply custom page headers to the selected post types.

lkUt1Q18Evos.title: Header Color
lkUt1Q18Evos.fieldCaption: The default background color for all headers.

0tMDcXyX5ktO.title: Header Background
0tMDcXyX5ktO.fieldCaption: The default background image for all headers.

iAxxJp8GzgSs.title: Header Height
iAxxJp8GzgSs.fieldCaption: (optional) Enter a height for the header area. This setting will not change the home page header.<br>Use pixels (e.g. 300px) or a percentage (e.g. 20%).

eXhgVZhT6kvh.title: List Style
eXhgVZhT6kvh.values:
excerpt=>Excerpts with link
full-content=>Full post, all on one page
eXhgVZhT6kvh.fieldCaption: All issues on a page with full content or show excerpts and link to the full content.

9H7Mmj9NowHb.title: Error Content
9H7Mmj9NowHb.fieldCaption: Optionally select a content source to show on the error page.

M63XDg0ndiEa.title: Error Template
M63XDg0ndiEa.fieldCaption: Select the template for the error page.

BhtjcOvQtyKS.title: Family
BhtjcOvQtyKS.fieldCaption: Enter the name of a standard system font. Separate multiple fonts with commas.

LEReg7Qs7UuE.title: Weight
LEReg7Qs7UuE.fieldCaption: Enter the font weight. Such as, normal, bold, 300, 800, etc.

KgatcDmCYZVT.title: Family
KgatcDmCYZVT.fieldCaption: Enter the name of a standard system font. Separate multiple fonts with commas.

2tBnVE75FdIg.title: Weight
2tBnVE75FdIg.fieldCaption: Enter the font weight. Such as, normal, bold, 300, 800, etc.

JB3xEc2DQ3w3.title: Accent
JB3xEc2DQ3w3.fieldCaption: The color to mark active and hover items.

cyyzOJSNFM6D.title: Drop Down
cyyzOJSNFM6D.fieldCaption: The sub-menu color. Leave blank to create automatically from menu background.

gIiJZNnBQd8Z.title: Accent
gIiJZNnBQd8Z.fieldCaption: The color to mark active and hover items.

GtGipvCkmheL.title: Drop Down
GtGipvCkmheL.fieldCaption: The sub-menu color. Leave blank to create automatically from menu background.

8BR5reYAGFZH.title: Logo Height
8BR5reYAGFZH.fieldCaption: Optional height for the logo image. Set value to half the height of the file for Hi-DPI (retina) display.

qGq07G9NujBO.title: Content Source
qGq07G9NujBO.fieldCaption: Select a content block for the source.

8hJxW9qhxh0u.title: Visibility
8hJxW9qhxh0u.fieldCaption: Include social icon links in the footer.

9aJ85H2syG6u.title: Visibility
9aJ85H2syG6u.fieldCaption: Select the content type for the overlap element or hide the area.

OOoOX0h1ttL0.title: Overlap - Background Color
OOoOX0h1ttL0.fieldCaption: The background color for footer overlap.

p7N5OcY3q922.title: Overlap - Background Image
p7N5OcY3q922.fieldCaption: The background image for footer overlap.

uzl7THrFTcMW.title: Overlap - Form
uzl7THrFTcMW.fieldCaption: Select a Ninja Form for the source.

FNgXwDpc1pl5.title: Overlap - Content Source
FNgXwDpc1pl5.fieldCaption: Select a content block for the source.

raHkLw3Bnzgo.title: Logo
raHkLw3Bnzgo.fieldCaption: Select a logo for the WordPress login screen <code>/wp-admin</code>. <br>Recommended size: 400px &times; 400px. Displays at maximum height of 200px.

7k2sLvB7WzXz.title: Background Color
7k2sLvB7WzXz.fieldCaption: Choose the background color of the WordPress login screen.

FEDljK83dXt1.title: Background Image
FEDljK83dXt1.fieldCaption: Choose the background image for the WordPress login screen.
